rules_text:
Once each turn, when you sacrifice a creature, the following occurs based on its power.
[b]1+ | [/b]Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
[b]2+ |[/b] Add {R}.
[b]3+ |[/b] Create a 2/1 red Spirit Elemental creature token with haste and “This creature can’t block.”
[b]4+ |[/b] Skilled Animancy deals 2 damage to any target.
